Hello? I'd like to report a fire in my home.
A fire in your home, sir?
Have you been hurt at all?
No, I haven't, but my friend seems to be burned.
Send an ambulance over here, please.
Yes, sir, we will. Where are you now?
I'm standing outside of my house.
It's 4428 Pine Street. Can you send someone here right away?
Yes, sir. We will send a fire truck and ambulance there immediately.
